structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: As used in KRS 65.810 to 65.830, unless the context otherwise requires, the word "district" shall mean, and the provisions of KRS 65.810 to 65.830 shall apply to, any special district governed by the following statutes: KRS 66.610 to 66.650, 74.010 to 74.415, 108.010 to 108.070, 184.010 to 184.300, and 267.010 to 267.990.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 2, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 64, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.
